SETRESUME.desc: Set resume mode. Clear on start or resume acquiring into same spectrum.

SETPRESETVALUE.desc: set the preset acquisition value for all channels

SETPRESETTYPE.desc: set the preset acquisition type for all channels

SETPEAKTIME1.desc: Peaking time of the energy filter

GETPEAKTIME1.desc: Peaking time of the energy filter

GETDYNRANGE1.desc: Energy range corresponding to 40% of the total ADC range

SETBASELENGTH1.desc: Set the number of samples averaged in the baseline filter, specified as number of samples

GETBASELENGTH1.desc: Get the number of samples averaged in the baseline filter, specified as number of samples

GETBINWIDTH1.desc: Width of the individual bin in the MCA spectrum

SETMAXENERGY1.desc: Set the maximum energy for the spectrum

GETMAXENERGY1.desc: Get the maximum energy for the spectrum

SETRESETDELAY1.desc: The time the processor should wait after the detector resets before continuing processing of the input signal

GETRESETDELAY1.desc: The time the processor should wait after the detector resets before continuing processing of the input signal

SETGAPTIME1.desc: The gap time of the energy filter. This only sets the minimum gaptime

SETTRIGPEAKTIME1.desc: The peaking time of the trigger filter

GETTRIGPEAKTIME1.desc: The peaking time of the trigger filter

SETTRIGGAPTIME1.desc: The gap time of the trigger filter

GETTRIGGAPTIME1.desc: The gap time of the trigger filter

SETMAXWIDTH1.desc: The maximum peak width for pile-up inspection

GETMAXWIDTH1.desc: The maximum peak width for pile-up inspection

xmap.desc: EDXD detector with XIA xMAP readout system
xmap.name: edxd

SETRESUME.desc: Set resume mode. Clear on start or resume acquiring into same spectrum.

SETPRESETTYPE.desc: set the preset acquisition type for all channels

GETPRESETTYPE.desc: Get the preset acquisition type for all channels

SETPRESETVALUE.desc: set the preset acquisition value for all channels

GETPRESETVALUE.desc: Get the preset acquisition value for all channels

GETNBINS.desc: The number of bins used in the MCA spectrum

SETNBINS.desc: Set the number of bins per spectrum for all channels

SETDYNRANGE.desc: set the dynamic range for all channels

SETBASELENGTH.desc: set the baseline average filter length for all channels

SETBINWIDTH.desc: set the spectrum bin width in eV for all channels

SCAACTIVATE.desc: Write the SCA limit configuration to hardware and activate the SCA feature

SCAACTIVE.desc: Indicate whether or not the SCA feature is currently active

SCAELEMENTS.desc: Number of SCAs enabled in the system
